mapper.update:
update product
pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL},
inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
csid = #{csid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product set pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, csid = #{csid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
